title: Bert +  Score Layer (LB 0.475)
description: In this kernel, I try to use Pretrain Bert Model and Feed Forword Network. ※I am just starter for deep learning. If there are some mistakes, please comment.  used code from the kernel below to get word Embedding from pretrain Bert mode. https://www.kaggle.com/mateiionita/taming-the-bert-a-baseline  Inspired by https://arxiv.org/pdf/1805.04893v1.pdf and https://cs.stanford.edu/people/kevclark/resources/clark-manning-emnlp2016-deep.pdf. I assume that FFNN reduce A, B, Pronoun dimensions(from Bert)  and  only  keep  information relevant to coreference decisions.
